parameters.name: DomainName
parameters.description: The accelerated domain name. You can specify only one domain name in each request.

parameters.name: EndTime
parameters.description:
The end of the time range to query.

Specify the time in the ISO 8601 standard in the yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ format. The time must be in UTC.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The number of the page to return. Valid values: an integer greater than 0.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page. Default value: **300**. Valid values: **1 to 1000**.

parameters.name: StartTime
parameters.description:
The beginning of the time range to query.

Specify the time in the ISO 8601 standard in the yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ format. The time must be in UTC.
